action.action-desc: Mr. Marino (for himself, Mr. Harper, Mr. Franks of Arizona, Mr. Poe of Texas, Mr. Byrne, and Mr. Rothfus) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To provide that no funds appropriated or otherwise made available may be used to implement, administer, carry out, or enforce certain memoranda related to immigration.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Defund Amnesty Act of 2015.

section.header: Limitation on the use of funds for certain purposes related to immigration
section.text: No funds appropriated or otherwise made available may be used to implement, administer, carry out, or enforce the following policy memoranda:

paragraph.text: The memoranda issued by the Secretary of Homeland Security on November 20, 2014.
The memoranda issued by the President on November 21, 2014, includingâ€”

subparagraph.text: the memorandum entitled Creating Welcoming Communities and Fully Integrating Immigrants and Refugees; and
the memorandum entitled Modernizing and Streamlining the U.S. Immigrant Visa System for the 21st Century.

paragraph.text: Any similar memorandum issued after November 21, 2014.
